caption.p: Evaluation of antimicrobial activity based on overgrowth of microbial culture over the disc of edible envelope; evaluation scale 1â€“5 (1 = disc completely clean; 5 = disc completely overgrown). The results are designated as follows: 7: 0.3gTr1OT80; 7C: 0.3gTr1; 8: 0.3gTr3OT80; 8C: 0.3gTr3; 13: OT20; 14: Tr0.5OT20.
